B

broadcast(String) - Method in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatServer
Sends a message to all connected clients.

C

ChatClient - Class in com.mycompany.chat_application
The ChatClient class represents a simple chat client that connects to a chat server and allows the user to send and receive messages.
ChatClient(String, int) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatClient
Constructs a new ChatClient object and connects to the chat server at the specified host and port.
ChatClient.ReceiveHandler - Class in com.mycompany.chat_application
The ReceiveHandler class is a thread that receives messages from the server and prints them to the console.
ChatClient.SendHandler - Class in com.mycompany.chat_application
A private inner class that implements the Runnable interface.
ChatServer - Class in com.mycompany.chat_application
This class implements a chat server that allows multiple clients to connect and chat with each other.
ChatServer(int) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatServer
Constructs a new ChatServer instance that listens for incoming client connections on the specified port.
ChatServer.ClientHandler - Class in com.mycompany.chat_application
The ClientHandler class implements the Runnable interface and is responsible for handling client connections on the server side.
ClientHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatServer.ClientHandler
Constructs a new ClientHandler instance for the specified client socket.
clients - Variable in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatServer
holds all the clients with their username and Socket as key value pair
clientSocket - Variable in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatServer.ClientHandler
Client Socket
com.mycompany.chat_application - package com.mycompany.chat_application
 

I

in - Variable in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatClient.ReceiveHandler

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatClient

R

ReceiveHandler(BufferedReader) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatClient.ReceiveHandler

run() - Method in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatClient.ReceiveHandler
Overrides the run() method from the Runnable interface.
run() - Method in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatClient.SendHandler
The run method of this class is called when the thread is started.
run() - Method in class com.mycompany.chat_application.ChatServer.ClientHandler
Listens for incoming messages from the client and broadcasts them to all other connected clients.

S
